alert.note: Alert for Brown; Callahan; Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:38PM CDT until June 17 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Callahan County in west central Texas... Northwestern Brown County in west central Texas... Northeastern Coleman County in west central Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 538 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Echo, or near Burkett, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Grosvenor around 545 PM CDT. Burkett around 550 PM CDT. Cross Cut around 605 PM CDT. Cross Plains around 610 PM CDT. May around 620 PM CDT. Atwell around 625 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Echo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
